title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 154 - Special Hauling Permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 154 - Special Hauling Permits

State Regulations

Subpart 154-1 - Nondivisible Load Permits (§ 154-1.0 to 154-1.21)

Subpart 154-2 - Divisible Load Overweight Permits (§ 154-2.0 to 154-2.22)

Subpart 154-3 - Nondivisible Load Status Determinations (§ 154-3.0 to 154-3.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 154

Statutory authority: Transportation Law, § 14[18]; Highway Law, §§10, 14, 16; State Finance Law, §15; Vehicle and

Traffic Law, § 385 [3], [15], as amd. by L. 1985, chs. 549, 929; L. 1986, ch. 603; L. 1995, ch. 659

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
